summary: Completed comprehensive testing of bulk actions feature in admin panel. Backend bulk endpoints working correctly (31/32 tests passed). Frontend UI fully functional with proper bulk selection, action bar, dialogs, and admin user exclusion. All previous features continue to work.

minor_issues.issue: Test expects 403 on 3rd record creation, but user was upgraded to 'pro' plan during testing
minor_issues.impact: Test logic issue, not application bug - user has higher limits after plan upgrade

passed_tests: Admin bulk operations properly exclude admin users
Bulk operations handle empty/admin-only selections correctly
Frontend bulk selection UI - individual user checkboxes (11 found)
Frontend bulk action bar appears when users selected
Frontend bulk action bar shows correct selection count
Frontend bulk change plan button and dialog
Frontend bulk delete button and confirmation dialog
Admin users correctly excluded from bulk selection (no checkbox)
Individual user actions still work (view records, change plan, etc)
Bulk action dialogs open and close properly
All existing admin features continue to work
All existing user management features continue to work
Backend API integration working for all bulk operations

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components and bulk integrations working)
